info.description: This is a sample server for MMA backend.
info.title: MMA Backend API

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available currencies

post.description: Adds a new currency to the system (admin operation)

get.description: Retrieves details for a specific currency by its 3-letter code

post.description: Adds a new exchange rate between two currencies for a specific date

400.description: Invalid input format or validation error

get.description: Retrieves the latest exchange rate for a given currency pair
Retrieves a list of users (potentially admin only)

post.description: Creates a new user (typically an admin action)

get.description: Retrieves details for a specific user by their ID

403.description: Forbidden (trying to access another user's details)

put.description: Updates a user's details (currently only name)

delete.description: Marks a user as deleted (soft delete)

get.description: Retrieves a list of workplaces the authenticated user belongs to.

post.description: Creates a new workplace and assigns the creator as admin.

get.description: Retrieves a list of accounts for the specified workplace if the user is a member.
get.summary: List accounts for current user in workplace

post.description: Creates a new account within the specified workplace.

400.description: Invalid input or missing Workplace ID

403.description: Forbidden (User cannot create in this workplace)

get.description: Retrieves details for a specific account by its ID within a workplace.
get.summary: Get account by ID from workplace

404.description: Account not found in this workplace

put.description: Updates details for a specific account within a workplace.

404.description: Account not found in this workplace

delete.description: Marks an account as inactive within a specified workplace.

404.description: Account not found in this workplace

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of transactions associated with a specific account within a workplace.
get.summary: List transactions for an account in a workplace

400.description: Missing Workplace/Account ID or invalid query params

404.description: Account not found in this workplace

get.description: Retrieves a list of journals for the specified workplace if the user is a member.
get.summary: List journals for current user in workplace

post.description: Creates a new journal entry within the specified workplace.
post.summary: Create a new journal in workplace

400.description: Invalid input or missing Workplace ID

403.description: Forbidden (User cannot create in this workplace)

get.description: Retrieves details for a specific journal entry by its ID within a workplace.
get.summary: Get a journal by ID from workplace

404.description: Journal not found in this workplace

put.description: Updates details (like description, date) for a specific journal entry within a workplace.
put.summary: Update a journal entry in workplace

404.description: Journal not found in this workplace

delete.description: Marks a journal entry as inactive within a specified workplace.
delete.summary: Deactivate a journal entry in workplace

404.description: Journal not found in this workplace

post.description: Adds a specified user to a workplace with a given role (requires admin permission).
post.summary: Add a user to a workplace

parentAccountID.description: Optional, must be UUID if provided

createdAt.description: Status domain.JournalStatus `json:"status"` // Status might not be needed/settable directly via CRUD

name.description: Only name is updatable for now

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
